cta: Request your service now from the NorthaTech team
hero_line3: Expertise in software development and modern technologies
hero_line5: A professional team to serve your business
hero_line6: Integrated solutions for managing your projects
hero_line7: We make a difference in the tech world
aboutwothoq_desc: NorthaTech is a Saudi company committed to empowering entrepreneurs in Saudi Arabia by providing a comprehensive range of services and solutions in technology and marketing. We are distinguished by providing outstanding services that meet the needs of the local and global market, working steadily and diligently for more than 6 years.
news1_desc: Wothoq has announced the launch of a new set of advanced technology services to support companies and organizations.
news2_desc: Wothoq has signed a strategic partnership with Zoho to provide integrated solutions for companies in the region.
news3_desc: Wothoq has expanded in the local market by opening a new branch and hiring specialized local staff.
webdev_desc: We create strategies for web design and development, focusing not only on aesthetics but also on:
services_section_desc: If you want to develop mobile applications, design your website, or create your brand identity, you have come to the right place! We deliver all of the above with great quality and unforgettable content.
services_web_desc: We create strategies for web design and development, focusing not only on the aesthetics of the site.
services_seo_desc: Boost your online presence and improve your ranking in free search engines like Google.
services_mobile_desc: Design and develop visually appealing, interactive, and user-friendly mobile applications for a creative impact.
services_social_desc: Your social media accounts help you showcase your work and services to clients in a creative and innovative way.
projects_task_desc: A comprehensive app for managing tasks and projects with an easy-to-use interface and advanced tracking and collaboration features.
projects_ecommerce_desc: A comprehensive e-commerce platform with a secure payment system, advanced inventory management, and a smooth user experience.
projects_cms_desc: An advanced content management system with an easy-to-use control panel and advanced editing and publishing features.
projects_social_desc: A social media app with advanced features for chatting, content sharing, and user interaction.
projects_elearning_desc: A comprehensive e-learning platform with interactive content, progress tracking, and performance evaluation system.
projects_hr_desc: A comprehensive HR management app with advanced features for employees, recruitment, and performance management.
testimonial_ahmed_text: Excellent service and professional team. They helped us grow our business significantly. Our experience with Wothoq was truly special, providing us with innovative solutions that contributed noticeably to our business growth. We wish them more progress and success.
testimonial_sara_text: Great experience with Wothoq. They provided us with innovative solutions that helped our business grow. The team is highly professional and committed to delivering the best services. We highly recommend working with them.
testimonial_khaled_text: A reliable and professional company. They helped us achieve our goals with high professionalism. Our dealings with them were ideal in terms of meeting deadlines and work quality. We consider them a strategic partner in our success.
testimonial_noura_text: Our experience with Wothoq was special. A professional team and outstanding service. They helped us develop our strategies and improve our performance significantly. We recommend working with them to anyone seeking high quality.
testimonial_mohamed_text: Wothoq excelled in providing outstanding services that greatly helped develop our business. The team is professional and committed. We consider them a key partner in our success.
testimonial_fatima_text: Great experience with Wothoq. They helped us improve our operations and develop our strategies. The team is highly professional and committed to delivering the best services.
testimonial_omar_text: Wothoq provided us with innovative solutions that helped develop our business. The team is professional and committed. We recommend working with them to anyone seeking high quality.
testimonial_layla_text: Our experience with Wothoq was special. They helped us develop our marketing strategies and improve our performance. The team is highly professional.
testimonial_yasser_text: Wothoq excelled in providing outstanding services that helped develop our projects. The team is professional and committed. We consider them a key partner in our success.
testimonial_mona_text: Great experience with Wothoq. They helped us develop innovative solutions to improve our business. The team is highly professional and committed to delivering the best services.
testimonial_dalal_text: I had an idea for an app and contacted them, and thank God they were there for me. Their advice was golden and they guided me with many things that enlightened my path. For two months, every question I had, they answered with open arms. Thank you as big as the sky!
testimonial_abuibtisam_text: Honestly, from my experience with them - they are very distinguished and understand the work - very classy and professional dealings - they help you develop the idea and look for unique things. I advise everyone to work with them.
testimonial_majed_text: It was a wonderful experience. Project leadership was smooth and creative. The Wothoq team lives the project details with you, applies the concept of user experience improvement in detail, and goes beyond just building the site to other tasks outside the contract requirements. Also, the prices are excellent compared to the service provided.
testimonial_nouf_text: I worked with Wothoq on several projects and it was a great experience every time. The team is highly professional and committed to providing the best solutions. They helped us develop our business significantly and we are happy to work with them.
testimonial_abdullah_text: Wothoq excelled in providing outstanding services that greatly helped develop our business. The team is professional and committed. We consider them a key partner in our success and recommend working with them.
about_desc1: NorthaTech is a Saudi company committed to empowering entrepreneurs in Saudi Arabia by providing a comprehensive range of services and solutions in technology and marketing. We are distinguished by providing outstanding services that meet the needs of the local and global market, working steadily and diligently for more than 6 years to raise the quality of technical services. Our creative team is highly skilled, developing mobile applications and websites, and providing graphic design and digital marketing services. We treat every project as a unique masterpiece, aiming to achieve the satisfaction of our partners in success.
about_desc2: At NorthaTech, we believe in aligning our clients' expectations with their business goals, and we work hard to turn their visions and ideas into optimal technical solutions. We always strive to achieve our partners' satisfaction by providing high-quality services and contributing to their success. Innovation and professionalism are at the core of our work, offering diverse services in areas such as mobile app development, web development, graphic design, and digital marketing strategies.
about_mission_desc: To provide innovative technical solutions at the highest level, exceeding our clients' expectations and fulfilling their aspirations.
about_vision_desc: To be one of the leading companies in the Middle East in providing high-quality and effective digital solutions to help our clients achieve growth and development for their businesses.
about_values_desc:
We believe in passion and keeping up with the latest technical updates in our field, which makes us maintain essential work traditions including:
● Providing strong technical services.
● Comprehensive understanding of client needs.
● Continuous development of our expertise and tools.
about_values_point3: Continuous development of our expertise and tools.
servicespage_desc: Discover our wide range of digital services designed to meet your business needs and achieve your goals.
projectspage_desc: Browse our wide range of projects that reflect our expertise and creativity in various fields.
productspage_desc: Discover our outstanding range of tech products that help your company grow and develop.
products_pm_desc: An integrated platform for project management that enables you to track tasks, manage teams, and organize resources efficiently.
pm_subtitle: An integrated platform for project management that enables you to track tasks, manage teams, and organize resources efficiently.
pm_feature1_desc: Track and assign tasks to the team with the ability to set priorities and deadlines.
pm_feature2_desc: Organize teams, manage roles and permissions, and track each member's performance.
pm_feature3_desc: Detailed reports on project progress, team productivity, and completion forecasts.
pm_feature4_desc: Seamless integration with communication tools, cloud storage, and other project management systems.
elearning_what_desc: The E-learning platform is a comprehensive solution that provides an advanced online learning environment, enabling educational institutions and companies to deliver high-quality educational content and efficiently manage the learning process.
elearning_feature4: Direct interaction between teacher and learner
cms_subtitle: A comprehensive solution for managing digital content easily and efficiently
cms_solution1_desc: Efficiently manage website, blog, and educational platform content.
cms_solution2_desc: Professionally manage product content, descriptions, images, and categories.
cms_solution3_desc: Easily manage educational content, courses, and resources.
cms_feature1_desc: A simple, intuitive interface that lets you manage content with ease.
cms_feature2_desc: Customize every aspect of the system to your needs.
cms_feature3_desc: Advanced security with data encryption and automatic backups.
cms_feature4_desc: Full support for Arabic and English, with the ability to add more languages.
ecommerce_subtitle: A comprehensive e-commerce solution offering a seamless shopping experience with advanced inventory management and secure payment system.
ecommerce_feature1_desc: Modern, attractive design with smooth user experience and easy navigation and search.
ecommerce_feature2_desc: Integrated inventory management system with product tracking, stock, and automatic alerts.
ecommerce_feature3_desc: Integration with various payment gateways ensuring transaction security and customer data protection.
ecommerce_feature4_desc: Comprehensive dashboard for managing sales, customers, reports, and statistics.
ecommerce_project_feature1_desc: Integration with various payment gateways, ensuring transaction security and customer data protection.
ecommerce_project_feature2_desc: Advanced inventory management system with product tracking, stock levels, and automatic alerts.
ecommerce_project_feature3_desc: Easy-to-use user interface with responsive design and a seamless shopping experience.
taskapp_desc: A comprehensive application for managing tasks and projects with an easy-to-use interface and advanced tracking and collaboration features.
taskapp_feature1_desc: An integrated system for managing tasks with the ability to set priorities, track progress, and manage deadlines.
taskapp_feature2_desc: Share tasks, comments, and updates with your team in real time.
taskapp_feature3_desc: Detailed reports and statistics on team performance and project progress.
products_ecommerce_desc: A comprehensive e-commerce solution offering a seamless shopping experience with advanced inventory management and secure payment system.
products_elearning_desc: A comprehensive e-learning system providing interactive content, quizzes, and learner progress tracking.
news_page_subtitle: Stay updated with our latest news, events, and articles.
news_article1_title: NorthaTech's Latest Achievements in App Development
news_article1_summary: We are pleased to announce the launch of our latest innovative apps, offering unique solutions for our clients across various sectors.
news_article2_title: NorthaTech Participates in Annual Tech Conference
news_article2_summary: Our team participated in this year's leading tech conference, showcasing our latest technologies and exchanging expertise with industry leaders.
news_article3_title: Tips to Improve Your Digital Presence in 2023
news_article3_summary: Your comprehensive guide to enhancing your digital presence and making the most of modern digital marketing strategies.
news_article4_summary: Join our interactive workshop to learn the basics of web design and start your creative journey.
news_newservices_p1: Wothoq has announced the launch of a new set of advanced technology services to support companies and organizations in the region. This step comes as part of the company's strategy to expand and provide innovative solutions that meet the growing needs of clients.
news_newservices_p3: The company's CEO said: 'We are excited to launch these new services, which have been developed based on our clients' needs and expectations. We always strive to provide the best technology solutions that help companies grow and develop in the digital age.'
news_newservices_p4: These new services complement the company's existing offerings, which include website and app development, SEO, and social media management.
news_newservices_p5: Companies and organizations interested in the new services can contact the Wothoq sales team for more information and free consultations.
news_localexpansion_p1: Wothoq has announced its expansion in the local market by opening a new branch and hiring specialized local staff. This expansion is part of the company's strategy to strengthen its presence in the local market and provide better services to its clients.
news_localexpansion_list1: Opening a new branch in the Eastern Province
news_localexpansion_list3: Expanding the range of services provided
news_localexpansion_p3: The company's CEO said: 'We are excited to expand in the local market and hire talented local staff. We always strive to provide the best services to our clients and create job opportunities for local youth.'
news_localexpansion_p4: He added: 'We believe in the importance of investing in local talent and developing their skills. We aim to build a strong and distinguished team that provides high-quality services to our clients.'
news_localexpansion_p5: Professionals interested in joining the Wothoq team can visit the careers page on the company's website or contact the HR team.
news_zoho_p1: Wothoq has signed a strategic partnership agreement with Zoho to provide integrated solutions for companies in the region. This partnership is part of Wothoq's strategy to deliver the best technology solutions to its clients.
news_zoho_list4: Specialized technical support and consulting services
news_zoho_p3: The CEO of Wothoq said: 'We are proud of this strategic partnership with Zoho, which will enable us to provide integrated and modern solutions to our clients. We always strive to deliver the best services and technologies that help companies grow and develop.'
news_zoho_p4: For his part, Zoho's regional representative said: 'We are excited about the partnership with Wothoq, which has extensive experience in providing technology solutions in the region. We look forward to working together to deliver the best solutions to companies and organizations.'
news_zoho_p5: Companies interested in the new solutions can contact the Wothoq sales team for more information and free consultations.
news_workshop_p1: We are pleased to invite you to attend a free workshop on the basics of web design, where we will learn about the most important principles and practical steps to build a professional website.
news_workshop_list1: Introduction to web design and its importance
news_workshop_p3: The workshop is suitable for beginners and anyone interested in learning the basics of web design. Attendance certificates will be provided to participants.
news_workshop_p4: To register or inquire, please contact our team via the email or phone listed on the contact page.
careers_intro: Join our innovative team and be part of our journey in the world of technology and digitalization.
careers_coming_soon: Career opportunities will be added here soon.
